relation.text: Condemned to Dye , Burnt in the Hand , and to be Whipt . Decemb . 6 . 1682
THis day the Sessions of Oyer and Terminer , began
was Convicted of four Trespasses , for Counterfeiting four several Bills in October
10th of October last , and Stealing several Goods of a considerable Value . [ Death . See summary . ] Robert Mason was found
hafted Knife value 8 shillings from John Hale the 17th of September
was found Guilty of Stealing 14 yards of Fustion ; value 14 shillings from John Clayton the 5th of November
June 82 , to the Value of 40 s
Saturday , John Brown . George Dix . Gamaliel Wells . Thomas Fisher . Francis Peirce . Thomas Page . Were
